short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fixes various flaws on KTH's Canvas implementation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is only meaningful if you are using KTH's Canvas instance.

Until the UI flaws have been fixed, this extension tries its best to fix them. If you find flaws, please contact me and I will try to fix them if no one else does.
